channel.title: Root Architecture on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Root Architecture on funPlantGenes

item.title: BUZZ
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi3g46007 Gene Symbol: BUZZ Gene Name: Genome: reference Bd21 genome Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: BUZZ: an essential gene for postinitiation root hair growth and a mediator of root architecture in Brachypodium distachyon.

item.title: CCD8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb153000 Gene Symbol: CCD8 Gene Name: CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE8 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: Cg1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GRMZM5G838324 Gene Symbol: Cg1 Gene Name: Corngrass1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: CsBPC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsBPC2 Gene Name: BASIC PENTACYSTEINE 2 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsBPC2 knockout reduced cucumber cold tolerance by increasing the chilling injury index, relative electrical conductivity and malondialdehyde (MDA) content and decreasing antioxidant enzyme activity.

item.title: GmEIL4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02g274600 Gene Symbol: GmEIL4 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmEIL4 enhances soybean (Glycine max) phosphorus efficiency by improving root system development.

item.title: GmEXPB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmEXPB2 Gene Name: β-expansin gene Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmEXPB2, a Cell Wall β-Expansin, Affects Soybean Nodulation through Modifying Root Architecture and Promoting Nodule Formation and Development.

item.title: GmPTF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.19g143900 Gene Symbol: GmPTF1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmPTF1 modifies root architecture responses to phosphate starvation primarily through regulating GmEXPB2 expression in soybean.

item.title: GmRR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.09g040000 Gene Symbol: GmRR1 Gene Name: a soybean type-B Response Regulator 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Soybean type-B response regulator GmRR1 mediates phosphorus uptake and yield by modifying root architecture.

item.title: GmWNK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmWNK1 Gene Name: WNK kinase homolog1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The soybean root-specific protein kinase GmWNK1 regulates stress-responsive ABA signaling on the root system architecture.

item.title: SbPSTOL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sb03g006765 Gene Symbol: SbPSTOL1 Gene Name: PHOSPHORUS-STARVATION TOLERANCE1 Genome: Species: Sorghum bicolor Functional Descriptions: SbPSTOL1 genes colocalized with quantitative trait loci for traits underlying root morphology and dry weight accumulation under low P via linkage mapping.

item.title: SlCCD8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlCCD8 Gene Name: CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE8 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The tomato CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE8 (SlCCD8) regulates rhizosphere signaling, plant architecture and affects reproductive development through strigolactone biosynthesis.
